title: World of the Innocent
description: Prior to the beginning of their unlikely relationship, Jhoi could not imagine having anything to do with a strange young man like Jaxon. Yet, despite her reservations, Jhoi soon finds that Jaxon has tapped into her guarded soul. Through the counsel of a wise old neighbor, Jhoi will discover the link between navigating intimate friendship and becoming a steward of an era. Can Jhoi's journey through love truly unlock the faith it takes to recapture human innocence?
author: Nadine C. Keels
